name: Splat Story
description:
A short action-platformer about saving your friend! Or your lovey-dovey sea slug partner :3c

This game was a final project for one of my classes in school. I really like it, and I'm proud of it!

All art assets were created by me. Sound effects are by Nintendo, music is by Undertale / Toby Fox.

Controls:
Arrowy Keys: Move
Space: Jump / Double Jump
Hold Down Arrow Key: Superjump
D: Attack
F5: Restart game
